name: Dr. M. Setup
description: Install your new game with the most advanced, state of the art, anti-bootlegging DRM this side of the Mississippi river! With this amazing piece of technology, you'll have to jump through hoops like proving you're a human (over and over and over), agreeing to the world's longest end-user license agreement, entering a CD-Key, and, the best part of all, installing the game! It's the most fun you can have with a pain in your behind!
